title: Bug 116609 [Regression] Color orange not functioning correctly
description: Bug 116609 is about the issue where color orange is not working as expected.
OB: When attempting to set the color or background color to orange for a report item, the expected visual appearance is not achieved.
EB: The color orange should be displayed correctly when set as the text color or background color for a report item.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Insert a report item. 
2. Set the color or background color to orange. 
3. Observe the displayed color on the report item.
